mapper.select: select a.author_id, a.list_list_id as author_list_id, a.name as author_name from authors a where a.list_list_id=#{readListId}
mapper.insert: insert into authors(author_id, list_list_id, name) values(#{authorId},#{readListId},#{name})
mapper.select: select max(author_id)+1 as res from authors
